name: Namco Museum Remix
overview: Featured in the compilation are the original arcade versions of Cutie Q, Dig Dug, Galaxian, Gaplus, Mappy, Pac & Pal, Pac-Mania, Super Pac-Man and Xevious. It also features re-vamped "Remix" variants of Pac 'n Roll, Galaga, Motos, Rally-X and Gator Panic. All of the "Remix" games feature Pac-Man in them even if they weren't in the original game it's based on.
